participant_1.background:
I like to dye my hair blue because it's fun and bright.
i am a dog walker.
I'm always making delicious French fries for my family.
my father lives in china.
my passion is photography.

participant_2.background:
I love the color orange and it reminds me of the beautiful sunsets I've seen on my long hikes.
My first cup of coffee in the morning inspires me to write and create content for my blog.
My most valued possession is my dog, because he is my best friend and always makes me happy.
i exercise everyday.
I spend my days doing schoolwork and physical therapy while healing from my broken leg.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Good! I have a broken leg but I'm still doing well, thanks for asking!
That's rough, hope you heal up soon!
Thanks! I'm trying to focus on the positive and it's given me a chance to catch up on my blog and exercise.
Nice! What do you blog about?
It's a lifestyle blog. I write about my adventures hiking, my dog, and my favorite recipes.
That sounds really cool! I love to hike, do you have any favorite trails?
Yes, I love hiking in the mountains in the summer. There are some really beautiful trails in the Tetons.
I've never been to the Tetons but they look amazing in pictures.
They're even better in person! You should definitely go sometime.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! Nice talking to you, have a good day!
